settings.name: Filter by Time Interval (minutes)
settings.description: The length of interval, in minutes, to which to filter data. Must be between 0 (no filtering) and 60.

settings.name: Bind additional timestamp columns
settings.description: Determines whether to append specific timestamp data (e.g. `hour`, `min`, `secs`, `hourmin`, `day`, `yearmonthday`) to the output.

settings.name: Bind 'time difference' column
settings.description: Determines whether or not to bind a column named `timediff_hrs`, providing the lag between consecutive locations, in decimal hours.

settings.name: Bind distance travelled column
settings.description: Determines whether or not to bind a column named `dist_m`, providing the distance travelled between consecutive locations, in metres.

settings.name: Bind speed column
settings.description: Determines whether or not to bind a column named `kmph`, providing the travelling speed between consecutive locations, km/h.

settings.name: Upper threshold for movement speed (kmph)
settings.description: The highest acceptable movement speed for all IDs (units: km/h). Any location with a speed exceeding this value will be removed as an outlier. Requires 'Bind speed column' option to be selected.

settings.name: Bind UTM location data
settings.description: Determines whether to generate and append Universal Transverse Mercator (UTM) data to the output. If TRUE, the primary geometry will become UTM data. NOTE: This will also remove points without any attached geometry.

settings.name: Provide EPSG code for UTM coordinates
settings.description: If *Bind UTM location data* is selected, please provide a valid EPSG code for the transformed coordinate system. Defaults to EPSG:32733 (UTM zone 33S)

settings.name: Name of 'primary animal identifier' column
settings.description: Name of the column to reset as primary identification. If no column is named, the default identifier column as used in Movebank remains the primary identifier.

settings.name: Name of altitude column
settings.description: Identify the input data column with altitude values (if any), to be renamed as `altitude`. Leaving blank generates an empty `altitude` column.

settings.name: Name of temperature column
settings.description: Identify the input data column with temperature values (if any), to be renamed as `temperature`. Leaving this empty generates an empty `temperature` column.

settings.name: Name of heading column
settings.description: Identify the input data column with heading values (if any), to be renamed as `heading`. Leaving this empty generates an empty `heading` column.

settings.name: Keep only essential columns
settings.description: If TRUE, the output data contains only the following columns (but not all, depending on which settings above are used): *temperature*, *heading*, *altitude*, *import_marked_outlier*, *index*, *hour*, *min*, *secs*, *hourmin*, *yearmonthday*, *gap_mins*, *kmph*, *dist_m*, *x (UTM)*, *y (UTM)*, *geometry (sf)*, *lon*, *lat*, *study*.
